data.title: Senior Data Engineer (Azure)
data.requirements:
• Have a bachelor’s degree in IT or related fields
  • Experience in Azure (> 2 Years is advantage)
  • Python and C++ programming language,
  • SQL, SQL DB, extensive ETL experience, Apache Hadoop and Spark,
  • May have experience in building ETL/ELT through PySpark. .
  • May have experience in designing job orchestration (ADF), sequence, metadata design, Audit trail, dynamic parameter passing and error/exception handling .
  • Agile delivery- A person must be able to show/review design and code on a daily basis .
  • Person must know test cases creation, unit testing, integration testing and QA testing.
  • Very good communication skills . Should be able to make design recommendations, and build out new design patterns
  • Experience in Azure Synapse, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Delta Lake, Azure service bus, Azure functions.

**Key success factors:

  • Results Focused and Outcome Driven
  • Creative Problem Solving
  • Teamwork and Cooperation
  • Effective Communication

BENEFITS:

  • 13th salary, 13 leave days
  • “CMC care” health insurance
  • Annual Summer Vacation: follows company’s policy
  • Salary review 2 times/year or on excellent performance
  • International, dynamic, friendly working environment
  • Annual leave, working conditions follow Vietnam labor laws.
  • Other allowances: working on-site allowance, etc.
  • Total allowances: 16.000.000 VND ~ 17.000.000 VND per year
  • Time working: 8: 30 a.m – 5:30 p.m (Mon – Friday)
  • Working place: 01 Sang Tao, Tan Thuan, District 7, HCMC
data.responsibilities:
• Be part of Agile Development team involved in Sprints to deliver world class solutions
  • Involved in ideation and suctioning sessions for product capabilities
  • Preferred candidates will have good knowledge of algorithms, data structures, and data warehousing concepts.
  • Preferred candidates will have knowledge of BI technologies, methodologies, and their application is a plus
  • Preferred candidates will have experience with AWS particularly AWS Glue
  • Familiar with Agile/Scrum development with sprints

data.title: Senior Full-stack Developer (Java, Angular)
data.requirements:
• Have a bachelor’s degree in IT or related fields
  • Experience required

**Front-end: 

  • Angular:
    • Rxjs, NGRX, Storybook
    • Must know how to create reusable components
    • Flexbox/Grid layout experience
    • Typescript, fundamentals
  • JavaScript fundamentals:
    • Data structures expertise
    • HTML/CSS
    • ES6
    • SCSS

**Back-end:

  • Possess good experience developing web application, Web Forms and Enterprise Workflows
  • 2-3 years’ experience mentoring junior engineers. Certifications in Java, J2EE etc preferred
  • 3-5 years of experience in systems analysis, design, programming and project management with knowledge of one or more of the following technologies:
    • Java, J2EE
    • Spring/Spring Boot, Hibernate, JPA Annotations, XML
    • JBoss Application Server
    • Oracle DB, SQL, PL/SQL, MongoDB, MySQL
    • KeyCloak, Tyk API, Docker
  • Familiar with software product life cycle and tools such as Junit, SonarQube

**Key success factors:

  • Results Focused and Outcome Driven
  • Creative Problem Solving
  • Teamwork and Cooperation
  • Effective Communication

BENEFITS:

  • 13th salary, 13 leave days
  • “CMC care” health insurance
  • Annual Summer Vacation: follows company’s policy
  • Salary review 2 times/year or on excellent performance
  • International, dynamic, friendly working environment
  • Annual leave, working conditions follow Vietnam labor laws.
  • Other allowances: working on-site allowance, etc.
  • Total allowances: 16.000.000 VND ~ 17.000.000 VND per year
  • Time working: 8: 30 a.m – 5:30 p.m (Mon – Friday)
  • Working place: 01 Sang Tao, Tan Thuan, District 7, HCMC
data.responsibilities:
• Be part of Agile Development team involved in Sprints to deliver world class solutions
  • Involved in ideation and solutioning sessions for product capabilities
  • Research and Development on relevant trending and emerging technologies as part of continuous innovation
  • Build in-depth domain knowledge on trade facilitation and logistics industry
  • Leverage and maximize DevOps tools and processes to increase quality, productivity and efficiency
  • Analyze issues, propose and implement production fixes
  • Coach and provide guidance to junior colleagues
  • Any other duties as and when assigned
  • Upkeep documentation practices and quality

data.title: Senior PySpark Python
data.requirements:
• Have a bachelor’s degree in IT or related fields

**Primary skills:

  • Overall 5+ years of experience with a strong background in EDW & ETL
  • 3+ Years of PySpark coding and Azure experience is must
  • Must have experience in building ETL/ELT through PySpark.
  • Must have experience in designing job orchestration (ADF), sequence, metadata design, Audit trail, dynamic parameter passing and error/exception handling
  • Agile delivery- Person must be able to show/review design and code on daily basis
  • Person must know test cases creation, unit testing, integration testing and QA testing. Very good communication skills
  • Should be able to make design recommendations, and build out new design patterns

**Secondary skills:

  • Exposure Scala, Databricks, Delta lake and notebooks development
  • Able to do low level design and build reusable components
  • Zeal to learn new tool/technologies and adoption
  • Exposure with DevOpS and CICD

**Key success factors:

  • Results Focused and Outcome Driven
  • Creative Problem Solving
  • Teamwork and Cooperation
  • Effective Communication

BENEFITS:

  • 13th salary, 13 leave days
  • “CMC care” health insurance
  • Annual Summer Vacation: follows company’s policy
  • Salary review 2 times/year or on excellent performance
  • International, dynamic, friendly working environment
  • Annual leave, working conditions follow Vietnam labor laws.
  • Other allowances: working on-site allowance, etc.
  • Total allowances: 16.000.000 VND ~ 17.000.000 VND per year
  • Time working: 8: 30 a.m – 5:30 p.m (Mon – Friday)
  • Working place: 01 Sang Tao, Tan Thuan, District 7, HCMC

data.title: Manual Tester
data.content:
We are looking for a thorough Software Tester. You will ensure that newly developed products are ready to perform and result in repeat clientele.

This is a newly created role and a great opportunity for someone to come in and make it their own.

There are a few things that we’ll need you to be across from the start and your role may evolve over time but, in the 1st instance, here’s an insight into what you could be doing:
data.requirements:
• Being able to write a good test case 
  • Being able to write a good Bug report 
  • Have basic knowledge on test techniques such as positive/ negative, equiv classes, boundary, etc... 
  • Familiar with Agile process and testing process 
  • Have experiences using test management tools such as Jira Test Repository, etc...
  • Have minimum 1 year experiences in testing on Mobile 
  • Proactive attitude is a must-do-not-wait for instruction/ do not leave things till deadline
  • Team work is a must: quick and willingly support other teams when needed

BENEFITS:

  • Package 14 salary months 
  • Extra package upto 16M/ year 
  • Young and dynamic working environment. 
  • Continuous development of hard and soft skills through work and professional trainings.
  • Opportunity to approach newest technology trends
  • Exciting leisure: sport and art events (football club, family day...)
  • Company's labor policy completely pursuant to Vietnamese labor legislation plus other benefits offered by the company (Company trip, Holiday, etc.)
data.responsibilities:
• Working closely to Product team to have correct understand requirements
  • Working closely to Develop team and Project Manager to align with release timeline
  • Carrying out test activities to ensure release quality and product's Time to Market 
  • Complied with testing process timeline on test artifacts such as test cases, test reports, etc...
